items.name: Lechon w/ Rice
items.description: Classic lechon meal served with rice, a ready-to-eat option perfect for students and anyone craving a quick, satisfying bite.

items.name: 1/4 Kilo Lechon
items.description: Juicy quarter portion of lechon, crispy skin and tender meat, ideal for sharing with friends or enjoying as a hearty solo meal.

items.name: 1/2 Kilo Lechon
items.description: Half a lechon with the perfect balance of crispy skin and tender juicy meat, great for barkada hangouts, or weekend family feasts.

items.name: 3 Kilo Lechon Belly
items.description: Our signature 3-kilo Lechon Belly – slow-roasted to perfection with shatteringly crispy golden skin and succulent, juicy meat infused with lemongrass, garlic, scallions, and secret spices. Ideal for medium gatherings (serves 10–15). A true Pinoy feast centerpiece!

items.name: 4 Kilo Lechon Belly
items.description: Generous 4-kilo portion of our famous roasted pork belly – ultra-crispy crackling skin that snaps with every bite, paired with tender, flavorful meat bursting with aromatic herbs and garlic. Perfect for larger family meals or events (serves 15–20). Pure indulgence!

items.name: 5 Kilo Lechon Belly
items.description: Our crowd-favorite 5-kilo Lechon Belly – expertly slow-roasted for that irresistible crunch on the outside and melt-in-your-mouth tenderness inside. Stuffed with fragrant lemongrass, garlic, and onions. Great value for big celebrations (serves 20–25)!

items.name: 5 Kilo & Above/per Kilo
items.description: Custom Lechon Belly starting at 5 kilos and up – premium roasted pork belly with impossibly crispy skin, juicy layers of flavorful meat, and aromatic stuffing that defines Filipino celebration food. Perfect for events of any size – contact us for bulk pricing and exact weight!

items.name: 25kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 25kg lechon – slow-roasted with ultra-crispy skin and tender, juicy meat. Perfect centerpiece for small gatherings.

items.name: 30kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 30kg lechon – expertly roasted with irresistible crispy crackling and flavorful, succulent meat inside.

items.name: 35kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 35kg lechon – generous roast featuring golden crispy skin and moist, delicious meat throughout.

items.name: 40kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 40kg lechon – impressive size with perfectly crisp skin and juicy, well-seasoned pork.

items.name: 50kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 50kg lechon – ideal for large celebrations, featuring signature crispy skin and tender, flavorful meat.

items.name: 60kg Whole Lechon
items.description: Whole 60kg lechon – very large roast with ultra-crispy skin and juicy, aromatic pork perfect for major events.
